high-performance.perfect: ğŸš€ Outstanding! Perfect execution with 0 hints and 0 errors! Your confidence is clearly high - you're ready for bigger challenges. I've updated your recommended goals to match your excellent progress!
high-performance.excellent: ğŸŒŸ Excellent work! Only {{hints}} hints and {{errors}} errors shows real mastery. With your high confidence level, you're ready for more advanced goals. I've updated your recommended goals to push you further!

struggling.with-anxiety: ğŸ’ª I see you're feeling anxious, but you pushed through {{errors}} errors and {{hints}} hints- that takes real courage! I've adjusted your goal recommendations to give you more support and build confidence step by step. You've got this!ğŸ¤—
struggling.default: ğŸ¯ Working through {{errors}} errors and using {{hints}} hints shows determination! Everyone learns at their own pace. I've updated your goals to better support your learning journey. You've got this!ğŸ¤—

consistent-improvement.message: ğŸ“ˆ Amazing progress! Your error rate improved by {{improvementPercent}}% from {{olderAvg}} to {{recentAvg}} - you're clearly learning and growing! I've updated your goals to celebrate and continue your improvement streak!

mixed-performance.frustrated: ğŸ¯ You're doing well ({{hints}} hints, {{errors}} errors), but I sense some frustration. That's completely normal! I've adjusted your goals to help you feel more successful. Remember, progress isn't always linear! ğŸ’™
mixed-performance.default: ğŸŒ± Good performance ({{hints}} hints, {{errors}} errors) but I want you to feel more confident too! I've updated your goals to support both achievement and confidence.

building-confidence.message: ğŸŒŸ Great work! {{hints}} hints and {{errors}} errors shows you're building solid skills. Your confidence is growing nicely - that's the foundation of all great learning! I've updated your goals to keep building on this positive momentum! Keep going!ğŸ’™

perfectionist.message: ğŸŒŸ Great job! You used no hints and made no errors! I notice you might still feel a bit stressed. Remember, learning doesn't have to be perfect every time. Let's set goals that celebrate your progress and keep things light. You're doing awesome!ğŸ’™

overconfident.message: ğŸ’ª I love your confidence! You used {{hints}} hints and made {{errors}} errors, which just means more chances to learn and grow. I've set goals that will challenge you while building on your positive mindset. Your enthusiasm is your superpower! ğŸš€

impostor-syndrome.message: ğŸ† Look at the data : only {{hints}} hints and {{errors}} errors - that's truly impressive! Your skills are real,even if you sometimes doubt them. It's normal to feel that way when you're growing. I've selected goals to help you recognize and trust your abilities and see your progress.You're more capable than you think!âœ¨

burnout-fatigue.message: ğŸŒ¿ I can sense you're putting in serious effort but feeling drained. That takes courage to keep going! Learning fatigue is real, and it's okay to adjust your pace. I've suggested lighter goals that will help you rebuild your enthusiasm while still making progress. Your wellbeing matters as much as your achievement! ğŸ’š

flow-state.message: âœ¨ You're in the learning zone! Great performance ({{hints}} hints, {{errors}} errors) plus you're clearly enjoying the process. This is what optimal learning looks like! I've chosen goals that will help you maintain this wonderful momentum and positive experience. This is the magic of engaged learning! ğŸŒŸ

frustrated-learner.message: ğŸ¤ I see you're putting in real effort ({{hints}} hints, {{errors}} errors) but feeling frustrated with the results. That's completely normal. Your hard work isn't wasted- sometimes learning often happens beneath the surface. I've adjusted your goals to help you see your progress more clearly. Your persistence will pay off!ğŸŒ±

anxious-high-achiever.message: ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸ Strong performance ({{hints}} hints, {{errors}} errors) but I want you to feel as good as your results look! High achievement shouldn't come with high anxiety. You're clearly capable - now let's work on making it feel sustainable and enjoyable. I've selected goals that maintain your high standards while supporting your emotional wellbeing. Excellence and peace can coexist! ğŸŒº

not-using-hints.message: ğŸ’¡ I notice you made more than {{errors}} errors without using any hints. That shows determination, but remember - hints are here to help you learn, not to make things easier! Using hints strategically can help you build understanding and confidence faster. I've updated your goals, and I encourage you to try using the hint system - it's a powerful learning tool! ğŸ“

hint-dependent.message: ğŸ¯ Great job getting a perfect score, but I noticed you used {{hints}} hints to get there. Hints are helpful for learning, but try challenging yourself to use fewer hints next time - it will help you build independent problem-solving skills and confidence! I've updated your goals to help you gradually reduce hint dependency while maintaining your success. You're capable of more than you think! ğŸ’ª

generic.message: ğŸ¯ Nice work! You used {{hints}} hints and made {{errors}} errors - every attempt helps you learn! I've updated your recommended goals based on your progress.

reasons.build-foundation: Building a strong foundation will help with more complex goals.
reasons.natural-progression: This is the natural next step in your learning journey.
reasons.address-struggles: This goal targets areas where you can improve.
reasons.leverage-strengths: This builds on your existing strengths.
reasons.variety: Trying different approaches helps deepen understanding.
reasons.consolidate: Consolidating your skills across methods is important.
reasons.challenge: You're ready for a bigger challenge!
reasons.consistency: Developing consistency will boost your confidence.

recommendations.no-recommendation: Great progress! Feel free to choose any goal that interests you.

claim-modal.title: Wozza! You Did It!
claim-modal.subtitle: You've already satisfied the conditions for this goal!
claim-modal.explanation: You've already fulfilled the conditions for this goal! If you'd like to track it, you can add it to your goal list and on your next excerise completion it will be marked as completed.

goal-completion-guide.title: How to Complete This Goal
goal-completion-guide.tip-take-time: Take your time and focus on understanding, not just speed.
goal-completion-guide.tip-use-hints: Don't hesitate to use hints when you're stuck.
goal-completion-guide.tip-review: Review the concept before starting if you're unsure.
goal-completion-guide.tip-practice: Practice makes perfect - don't worry about mistakes!
goal-completion-guide.tip-reflect: Reflect on what you learned after each exercise.
goal-completion-guide.tip-strategy: Think about which method is most efficient for each problem.
goal-completion-guide.tip-accuracy: Focus on accuracy rather than rushing through.
goal-completion-guide.tip-independence: Challenge yourself to work without hints when possible.

reasons.not-confident: You're not confident yet, so this goal provides a supportive starting point.

reasons.very-confident: With your high confidence, this goal offers the right level of challenge.
reasons.expert: As an expert, this goal targets advanced skills.
reasons.quick-practice: You prefer quick sessions. This goal fits short, focused exercises.
reasons.deep-understanding: You value deep understanding. This goal encourages thorough comprehension.
reasons.problem-variety: You enjoy variety. This goal exposes you to different approaches.
reasons.skill-building: You focus on skill building. This goal develops specific competencies.
